Constructor Summary
MusicScore()
           
 
Method Summary
 void addNote()
          addNote adds a note and length of a note to the existing score
 void newScore()
          newScore starts a newScore and clears the old score
 void printScore()
          printScore prints the current Score
 void repeatNotes()
          repeatNotes prints the score and also allows the repetition of notes from the current score

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
